usecase.name: Product Price Comparison
usecase.scenario: User compares prices for multiple products from different online retailers.
usecase.preconditions: User is registered and logged in
steps: User enters search criteria for a product
User views the list of product results with prices from multiple retailers
User selects a product to view detailed information
User compares prices and retailer ratings
User adds the selected product to the cart

testcases.name: Valid Product Search
testcases.description: Verify that a user can successfully search for a product and view prices from multiple retailers.

testcases.name: Product Comparison
testcases.description: Verify that the user can compare prices and ratings for a selected product.

testcases.name: Add to Cart
testcases.description: Verify that the user can add a product to the shopping cart.

usecase.name: Price Drop Alerts
usecase.scenario: User sets up price drop alerts for specific products.
usecase.preconditions: User is registered and logged in, selected product in the wishlist
steps: User navigates to the product details page
User sets up a price drop alert for the selected product

testcases.name: Set Price Drop Alert
testcases.description: Verify that the user can successfully set up a price drop alert for a selected product.

testcases.name: Invalid Target Price
testcases.description: Verify that the system handles the case where the user sets an invalid target price.

usecase.name: View Product Details
usecase.scenario: User explores detailed information about a specific product.
usecase.preconditions: User is registered and logged in
steps: User enters search criteria for a product
User selects a product from the search results
User views detailed information about the selected product

testcases.name: Valid Product Selection
testcases.description: Verify that a user can successfully select a product and view its detailed information.

testcases.name: Invalid Product Selection
testcases.description: Verify that the system handles the case where the user tries to view details for a non-existing product.

usecase.name: Search Using Filters
usecase.scenario: User narrows down product search results by applying filters.
usecase.preconditions: User is registered and logged in
steps: User enters search criteria for a product
User applies filters such as price range, brand, websites etc.

testcases.name: Filter by Price Range
testcases.description: Verify that a user can successfully filter search results by a specified price range.

testcases.name: Filter by Brand
testcases.description: Verify that a user can successfully filter search results by a specific brand.

usecase.name: Product Recommendations
usecase.scenario: User receives personalized product recommendations based on their previous interactions with the website.
usecase.preconditions: User is registered and logged in, has previous interactions with the website
steps: User logs in with their credentials
User views the homepage or a dedicated recommendations section
Recommendation Engine analyzes user's browsing and purchase history

testcases.name: View Recommended Products
testcases.description: Verify that a user can view personalized product recommendations.

testcases.name: Relevance of Recommendations
testcases.description: Verify that recommended products are relevant to the user's preferences and history.

testcases.name: Dynamic Recommendations
testcases.description: Verify that recommended products dynamically update based on the user's ongoing interactions.
